term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - dynamic reaction path (DRP)
term.title: dynamic reaction path

item.text: A classical trajectory method based on molecular orbital calculations which determines atomic accelerations, velocities and positions using the energy gradient, and does not require prior knowledge of the potential energy surface.

sources.item: PAC, 1999, 71, 1919. 'Glossary of terms used in theoretical organic chemistry' on page 1935 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199971101919)
